page.title: 01WINGFIELD AREA GAZETTEER
page.content: {WINGFIELD}, WILTSHIRE. On county border with Avon & Somerset. Farming area . TROWBRIDGE 2 Mls. BATH 11 mls . From Saxon{"WINNA'S FEL"} Winna's clearing (in a forest). Also called { {WINKFIELD}in the past. {P.O.}Chapel Lane , a.m. only. Public telephone near crossroads.{P.O.}at FARLEIGH. {TROUT FARM}at FARLEIGH. {GARAGE}Moore's ,Church Lane, MOT's, servicing , no petrol. {WOODYARD} Moore's, Church Lane, coal,fencing, pit props, fire and builders' wood. {SCHOOL & ST. MARY'S CHURCH}15th C. Church Lane. {INNS}"THE POPLARS" beer from the wood. "HUNGERFORD ARMS" meals , overlooks ancient mon. at FARLEIGH. {HISTORIC BUILDINGS}rems. of Farleigh Castle 15th C.,Iford manor set in picturesque wooded valley. Stowford mill and farm 15th C. now a caravan and craft centre.
